attributes.action: Look at my petition again. on  eradicate poverty worldwide
attributes.additional_details: I want to encourage all people to pledge £1.00 for the simple art of living of life. This is put in the / their government coffer for security a safety net. This is only the start on a worldwide campaign this is a ’people to people’ and ‘government to government’. It is not an issue to be taken lightly.
attributes.background: . It is for “People”. Everyone to working to eradicate poverty worldwide. Below link is what I called buy the money project it is an initiative, that have as a Better Britain challenge http://www.publications.parliament.uk/pa/cm200506/cmselect/cmworpen/616/616we56.htm

rejection.details: If you could explain your request more clearly, we could look at this again.
